QuestData.Title: Leyline Proficiency
QuestData.Description:
Our leyline feed grows stronger.
The more powerful our feed becomes, the more I learn about ancient mana itself.
Of course, as my apprentice, you may reap the benefits of my discoveries. Listen well, and I will teach you how to extract power from your enemies more reliably.
QuestData.RewardText: Do your best to pick this up the first time - I do hate repeating myself.
